generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with tram tracks and lane markings, which is a road.
- sidewalk: There is a designated pedestrian area on the left side of the road, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story structures with windows and facades are visible along the street, which are buildings.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the right side of the road, which is an individual standing wall.
- fence: A low fence or railing is visible along the top of the stone wall on the right side.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: Blue circular traffic signs with white symbols are visible on poles along the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green and brown leaves are visible along both sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass is visible on top of the stone wall on the right side of the road.
- sky: A cloudy sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked on the left side of the road.
- truck: A white pickup truck is visible on the far left side of the road.
- bus: A red and white tram/bus is visible in the distance, moving towards the camera.
- train: The tram/bus on the tracks is a train.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible.
